price: "Ou sua água tomar-se-á subtérrea e, jamais, poderás readquirí-la."
arabic: أَوۡ يُصۡبِحَ مَآؤُهَا غَوۡرٗا فَلَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ لَهُۥ طَلَبٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: aw yuṣ'biḥa māuhā ghawran falan tastaṭīʿa lahu ṭalaban
